sn_aia_version.instructions: 1. Parse the input JSON to extract all buckets and their assigned defects. 2. For each bucket in the JSON, retrieve the list of existing bucket choices from the GAIC Defect table. If there are no choices present than move to the next bucket. 3. Compare each JSON bucket to the existing bucket choices using a similarity metric. 4. If a JSON bucket is very similar to an existing bucket, replace the JSON bucket with the existing bucket name. 5. If no similar existing bucket is found, retain the original JSON bucket name. 6. Update the JSON structure with the standardized bucket names. 7. Return the updated JSON as output.
